mapper.insert: insert into comment (content, post_id, user_id, created_at) values (#{content}, #{postId}, #{userId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select c.id cid, c.content, c.like_count, c.post_id, c.user_id, c.created_at, u.id, u.nickname, u.avatar_url, u.gender from comment c join user u on c.user_id = u.id where c.post_id = #{postId} and c.deleted = 0 order by c.created_at desc
select count(1) from comment where post_id = #{postId} and deleted = 0
select c.id, c.content, c.like_count, c.post_id, c.created_at, c.user_id from comment c where c.id = #{id} and c.deleted = 0
